summary: The Apocrypha background music with the heavy bass rumbling filtered out.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1372016-dragonborn-bass-pumping-sound-removal/]By request[/url], a version of the Apocrypha background music with the heavy bass rumbling filtered out.

Install: Extract the archive into your game directory. It contains two .xwm files that go into the /Data/Music folder. To uninstall, just delete those files.

Permissions: I claim nothing. Original game audio copyright Bethesda Game Studios.
author: carpetbulge
